title: MAFS' Elizabeth Sobinoff leaves fans concerned by her 'tiny' frame
text:
Elizabeth Sobinoff has sparked fears for her well-being after showing off her 'tiny' frame in a photo shared to Instagram on Tuesday.

The Married At First Sight star, who has lost 10kg over the past few months, posed in a plunging black jumpsuit that highlighted her slender frame.

While many fans praised her appearance, others expressed concern and said she had taken her weight loss journey too far.

'Please don't lose any more weight!' MAFS star Elizabeth Sobinoff has sparked fears for her well-being after showing off her 'tiny' frame in this photo shared to Instagram on Tuesday

One follower wrote: '[She's] looking so thin and sick, hope all is OK. Hopefully you can put some kilos back on. This does not look good on you.'

Another commented: 'No-one is being nasty or horrible, just stating the facts. Lizzie has a warm, generous soul, however I would be worried if she was my daughter. She doesn't look well, but if she's happy that's all that matters.'

'You look amazing but don't lose any more weight. You were beautiful on MAFS,' a third fan wrote.

'This does not look good on you': While many fans praised Elizabeth's appearance, others expressed concern and said she had taken her weight loss journey too far

Before and after: Since appearing on Married At First Sight earlier this year, Elizabeth has completely transformed her appearance and lost 10kg in the process

Similar comments included, 'So tiny...', 'Where have your luscious hips gone?' and 'Wow, you have lost so much weight.'

However, Elizabeth did have her fair share of supporters, with one fan writing: 'Not every picture is about how someone looks! The world doesn't revolve around looks or likes.'

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Elizabeth Sobinoff's representative for comment.

Worried: One concerned fan wrote, 'No-one is being nasty or horrible, just stating the facts. Lizzie has a warm, generous soul, however I would be worried if she was my daughter'

Fears: Another of Elizabeth's followers asked, 'Where have your luscious hips gone?'

Support: Elizabeth did have her fair share of supporters, however, with one fan writing, 'Not every picture is about how someone looks! The world doesn't revolve around looks or likes'

Body positivity: 'I love my body... at any size,' Elizabeth recently told NW magazine. 'I've thought that when I weighed 49kg and when I've weighed 90kg'

Since appearing on Married At First Sight earlier this year, Elizabeth has completely transformed her appearance.

She has ditched her blonde hair extensions and embraced a more natural brunette shade, toned down her makeup, and shed an impressive 10kg.

'I love my body... at any size,' she recently told NW magazine.

Shocking comment: Elizabeth was paired with Sam Ball (right) on MAFS. On their wedding day, the tradesman infamously 'fat shamed' his bride by saying he didn't 'usually date girls her size'

'I've thought that when I weighed 49kg and when I've weighed 90kg. I want women to realise that we're all so much more than a number on a scale,' she added.

'So, yes, I've lost some weight since I was a "huge" size 10 when I was on MAFS, but that doesn't mean I'm any "better" now, just because I'm slimmer.'

Elizabeth was paired with Sam Ball on MAFS. On their wedding day, the tradesman infamously 'fat shamed' his bride by saying he didn't 'usually date girls her size'.
description: Elizabeth Sobinoff has sparked fears for her well-being after showing off her 'tiny' frame in a photo shared to Instagram on Tuesday.
authors: Jo Scrimshire For Daily Mail Australia
